org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.optor

Class OptimiserFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.optor.OptimiserFactory

  • public abstract class OptimiserFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    This factory is used by Computing Elements to obtain an instance of the required optimiser.

    Copyright (c) 2004 CERN, ITC-irst, PPARC, on behalf of the EU DataGrid. For license conditions see LICENSE file or http://www.edg.org/license.html

    Since:
    JDK1.4

    • Method Detail

      • getOptimisable

        public static Optimisable getOptimisable(GridSite site)
        Returns an Optimisable instance based on the parameters input to the simulation. This method is called by Computing Elements which are on site.
        Returns:
        An Optimisable instance.

      • getOptimisable

        public static Optimisable getOptimisable()
        Returns an Optimisable instance based on the parameters input to the simulation. This method is used by the RB which does not reside on any particular site and only uses getAccessCost().
        Returns:
        An Optimisable instance.

      • getOptAlgo

        public static java.lang.String getOptAlgo()
        Simple routine that returns a text string describing the optimisation algorithm
